mapper.insert: MERGE INTO CART_TBL USING DUAL ON (MEM_ID = #{mem_id} AND PDT_NUM = #{pdt_num}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CART_AMOUNT = CART_AMOUNT + #{cart_amount} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (CART_CODE, PDT_NUM, MEM_ID, CART_AMOUNT) VALUES (SEQ_CART_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{pdt_num}, #{mem_id}, #{cart_amount})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_CODE, C.PDT_NUM, C.MEM_ID, C.CART_AMOUNT, P.PDT_IMG_FOLDER, P.PDT_IMG, P.PDT_NAME, P.PDT_PRICE, M.MEM_POINT FROM CART_TBL C INNER JOIN PRODUCT_TBL P ON C.PDT_NUM = P.PDT_NUM INNER JOIN MEMBER_TBL M ON C.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID WHERE C.MEM_ID = #{mem_id}
